org.apache.polygene.entitystore.hazelcast

Interface HazelcastEntityStoreConfiguration


  • public interface HazelcastEntityStoreConfiguration
    Configuration of HazelcastEntityStoreService.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Property<String> configXmlLocation()
      The location of the Hazelcast configuration XML file.
      Property<String> mapName()
      The name of the Hazelcast map that is the key-value entity store.

    • Method Detail

      • configXmlLocation

        @Optional
Property<String> configXmlLocation()
        The location of the Hazelcast configuration XML file. If the property is not a URL, it will be tried as a path name on the classpath.
        Returns:
        The location of the Hazelcast configuration XML file. Defaults to hazelcast-default.xml

      • mapName

        @Optional
Property<String> mapName()
        The name of the Hazelcast map that is the key-value entity store.
        Returns:
        the name of Hazelcast map containing the entities. Defaults to "polygene:entitystore:data"
